sentences.en: He had rolled down a declivity of twelve or fifteen feet.
sentences.cn: 他是从十二尺或十五尺高的地方滚下来的.

sentences.en: I looked frontage straightly , going declivity one by one.
sentences.cn: 我两眼直视前方,一路下坡又下坡.

sentences.en: The south declivity of Yimeng Uplift and the slope places around Central Uplift are the important areas for surveying gas reservoirs in regional stratigraphic traps.
sentences.cn: 伊盟隆起南坡、中央古隆起的围斜部位是寻找区域地层圈闭气藏的重要地区；

trans.tran_en: a downward slope, esp of the ground
